name: Lobby 2
description:
Fallenshadow has charmed her husbands and they are now trying to catch her, fight them off in Lobby 2, a 2D top down, timed survival game. Take on the forms of 12 girls to access 70 perks and create a Shondo able to withstand her husbands love

Key Features

  • Custom Builds: 70 perks from 12 classes can be combined to create a custom build
  • Alternative modes: Activate ribbons that change how the game is played for unique runs
  • Fast sessions: 20 minute timed mode and endless mode
  • Persistent progress: Unlock upgrades that carry over across runs
  • Stream references: Every perk refers back to memorable stream moments
  • Easy Controls: Directional aim and automatic firing makes playing easy
